instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water for 20 minutes.
Stir-fry garlic and tofu until golden.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Add noodles and sauce, toss until combined.
Garnish with peanuts and lime.
flavor_notes: Savory-sweet with tangy lime, mild chili heat.

instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger until golden.
Add tomatoes and spices, cook until soft.
Add chickpeas and simmer for 15 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or roti.
flavor_notes: Rich, warm spices with tangy tomato base.

instructions: Blanch broccoli for 2 minutes.
Stir-fry garlic until fragrant.
Add broccoli, soy sauce, and sesame oil.
Thicken with cornstarch slurry.
flavor_notes: Garlicky, savory, with a nutty finish.

instructions: Preheat oven to 220°C.
Spread sauce on dough, add mozzarella and basil.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until cheese melts.
flavor_notes: Fresh basil aroma with mild creamy cheese.

instructions: Stir-fry garlic and chili.
Add bell pepper and cook briefly.
Add rice, soy sauce, and basil. Stir-fry until fragrant.
Cook onion and tomato until soft.
Blend into smooth gravy.
Add butter, cream, garam masala, and paneer. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Boil pasta until al dente.
Sauté vegetables until tender.
Toss pasta with vegetables and parmesan.
Toast peppercorns, then grind.
Stir-fry garlic, ginger, chili bean paste.
Add tofu and simmer with seasonings.
Garnish with spring onions.
Heat curry paste, add coconut milk.
Add vegetables, simmer until tender.
Stir in basil before serving.
flavor_notes: Creamy coconut base with herbal aroma.

instructions: Sauté cumin seeds and ginger.
Add potatoes, cauliflower, turmeric, and salt.
Cook covered until tender.
Sauté carrot and celery for 5 minutes.
Add zucchini, tomato, beans, and broth.
Simmer for 20 minutes.
Add pasta and cook until tender.
flavor_notes: Comforting, savory with a light herbal aroma.

instructions: Stir-fry garlic and ginger until fragrant.
Add cauliflower and cook until slightly tender.
Add sauce and peanuts, stir-fry for 3-4 minutes.
Fry onions until golden.
Add vegetables and biryani masala.
Layer par-cooked rice over vegetables.
Steam on low heat for 15 minutes.
Spiralize zucchini into noodles.
Blend basil, pine nuts, garlic, olive oil into pesto.
Toss noodles with pesto.
Pan-fry tofu until golden.
Add bell pepper and pineapple, stir-fry briefly.
Add sauce and toss until coated.
Sauté onion and ginger until golden.
Add tomato and spices, cook until soft.
Add kidney beans, simmer for 20 minutes.
Toast bread slices.
Top with diced tomato, basil, garlic, and olive oil.
Stir-fry garlic until fragrant.
Add cabbage and soy sauce, cook 3-4 minutes.
Finish with sesame oil.
flavor_notes: Savory with mild sweetness from cabbage.

instructions: Mix spinach and ricotta.
Stuff cannelloni with mixture.
Place in baking dish, cover with tomato sauce.
Bake for 30 minutes at 180°C.
Cook glutinous rice until tender.
Heat coconut milk with sugar until dissolved.
Pour over rice and top with mango slices.
flavor_notes: Sweet, creamy, with tropical fruit aroma.

instructions: Stir-fry vegetables with soy sauce for 2-3 minutes.
Cool mixture and wrap in spring roll wrappers.
Deep fry until golden.
flavor_notes: Crispy outside with savory, fresh vegetable filling.

instructions: Cook lentils with turmeric until soft.
Tempering: sauté cumin and onion, add tomato, cook until soft.
Mix tempering into lentils and simmer briefly.
Stir-fry bell pepper and pineapple.
Add rice, soy sauce, and cashews. Toss well.
flavor_notes: Sweet pineapple with savory soy and nutty crunch.

instructions: Blanch spinach and blend into puree.
Cook onion, garlic, and spices.
Add spinach puree and paneer, simmer for 5 minutes.
flavor_notes: Mildly spiced with fresh spinach flavor.

instructions: Slice tomato and mozzarella.
Arrange with basil, drizzle olive oil.
Stir-fry garlic and ginger.
Add eggplant, soy sauce, and vinegar, cook until tender.
Pound chili and peanuts in mortar.
Add papaya, tomato, lime juice, toss well.
Mix vegetables, flour, and seasonings, shape into balls.
Fry until golden.
Simmer in soy sauce-based gravy.
flavor_notes: Spicy, tangy, with a crunchy-soft texture.

instructions: Sauté vegetables separately.
Combine and simmer until tender.
flavor_notes: Savory, herby, with natural sweetness from vegetables.

instructions: Mash boiled potatoes, mix with spices and bread crumbs.
Shape into patties and shallow fry until golden.
flavor_notes: Crispy outside, soft and mildly spiced inside.

instructions: Stir-fry tofu until golden.
Add vegetables, peanuts, and sauce.
Cook until heated through.
Boil noodles, set aside.
Stir-fry vegetables, add noodles and sauce.
Boil noodles and drain.
Fry garlic and chili flakes in oil.
Add noodles, soy sauce, and spring onions.
Toss well and serve.
Blend basil, pine nuts, garlic, and olive oil into a paste.
Cook spaghetti and drain.
Mix pesto with pasta and serve.
Boil lemongrass and galangal in water.
Add vegetables and tofu.
Season with lime juice and chili paste.
Simmer and serve hot.
Cook rice with onions, tomatoes, and spices.
Stuff into hollowed capsicums.
Bake until capsicums are tender.
flavor_notes: Smoky with a spiced rice filling.

instructions: Blend cashews with coconut milk to a smooth paste.
Sauté vegetables with cumin until tender.
Add coconut-cashew paste and simmer for 10 minutes.
Sauté onions and garlic, add mushrooms and cook until soft.
Add cream and simmer 5 minutes.
Toss with cooked pasta and serve.
Cook lentils with turmeric until tender.
Sauté onions and garlic, add to lentils.
Add spinach and simmer 5 minutes.
Mix mango and carrot.
Add lime juice, crushed peanuts, and chili.
Toss and serve chilled.
Sauté onions and cumin.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add chickpeas and spinach, simmer 10 minutes.
Sauté onion and eggplant until soft.
Add tomatoes, capers, and olives, simmer 20 minutes.
flavor_notes: Savory, slightly tangy, with Mediterranean aroma.

instructions: Fry tofu until golden, set aside.
Stir-fry broccoli with garlic and ginger.
Add tofu back and soy sauce, toss well.
Sauté onions and cumin seeds.
Add pumpkin and tomatoes, cook until tender.
Add coconut milk and simmer 5-10 minutes.
flavor_notes: Sweet and savory with mild spice.

instructions: Cook rice noodles according to package instructions.
Stir-fry tofu and add noodles.
Mix in bean sprouts, peanuts, and lime juice.
flavor_notes: Sweet, tangy, nutty, with a fresh lime aroma.

instructions: Sauté onion in olive oil.
Add rice and toast for 2 minutes.
Gradually add broth, stirring, and fold in squash until cooked.
flavor_notes: Creamy, rich, slightly sweet from squash.

instructions: Fry tofu until golden.
Stir-fry vegetables with garlic.
Add tofu and basil, toss with soy sauce, and serve.
Sauté vegetables until tender.
Add cauliflower and soy sauce, stir-fry 5 minutes.
Garnish with green onions.
Cook noodles according to package instructions.
Stir-fry vegetables with garlic.
Add noodles and soy sauce, toss until heated.
Heat oil and add cumin seeds.
Sauté onions until golden, add tomatoes and spices.
Add okra and cook until tender.
flavor_notes: Savory, slightly tangy, and warmly spiced.

instructions: Roast eggplants until charred, peel and mash.
Sauté onions, garlic, tomatoes, and spices.
Mix in mashed eggplant and cook until flavors blend.
Heat oil and sauté onions until soft.
Add spices, cauliflower, and peas.
Cook until vegetables are tender.
Marinate paneer and vegetables in yogurt and masala.
Thread onto skewers.
Grill until golden and slightly charred.
Heat oil, sauté onions and bell peppers.
Add mushrooms, tomatoes, and kadai masala.
Cook until mushrooms are tender.
Boil potatoes until tender.
Sauté onions, garlic, and spices, then add spinach and potatoes.
Cook until spinach wilts.
Cook chana dal until half-done.
Add lauki, onions, and spices.
Simmer until both are tender.
Sauté onions until golden.
Add tomatoes, spices, and tinda.
Cook until tender.
Sauté onions and whole spices.
Add vegetables, rice, and water.
Cook until rice is fluffy.
Cook dal until soft.
Prepare tadka by frying spices in oil.
Pour tadka over dal and mix well.
Roast rava until fragrant.
Sauté vegetables and spices.
Add water and rava, cook until fluffy.
Pressure cook chickpeas until soft.
Sauté onions, tomatoes, and spices.
Mix with chickpeas and simmer.
Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, and green chili.
Add grated beetroot and stir-fry until tender.
Mix in grated coconut, cook for 1-2 minutes, and serve.
flavor_notes: Mild, earthy, with a hint of coconut sweetness.

instructions: Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, and green chili.
Add shredded cabbage, stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Mix in grated coconut, cook briefly, and serve.
Mix all ingredients into a soft dough.
Roll into thin discs.
Cook on a hot griddle with oil until golden spots appear.
Lightly fry paneer cubes and set aside.
Sauté onions, tomatoes, and spices.
Add peas and paneer, simmer until cooked.
Heat oil, add cumin seeds and onions, sauté until golden.
Add potatoes, cauliflower, turmeric, and salt.
Cook covered until vegetables are tender.
Wash rice and dal together.
Cook with spinach, turmeric, ginger, salt, and water until soft.
Mash lightly and serve hot.
Boil tomatoes, tamarind pulp, and rasam powder in water.
Temper mustard seeds and curry leaves in oil.
Add tempering to the rasam and serve hot.
Heat oil and sauté onions until translucent.
Add bitter gourd, turmeric, chili powder, and salt.
Cook on medium flame until slightly crisp.
flavor_notes: Bitter, savory, with a hint of spice.

instructions: Soak rice and dal for 6 hours, grind into batter.
Mix in yogurt, vegetables, spices, and let ferment.
Pour into greased pan, bake until golden.
Fry okra until lightly crisp and set aside.
Cook onions and spices, then add yogurt on low flame.
Mix in okra, simmer briefly, and serve.
Grind soaked dal into a smooth batter.
Add onions, chili, coriander, and salt.
Cook thin pancakes on a hot griddle until golden.
Rinse poha and drain.
Sauté mustard seeds, onions, and vegetables.
Add turmeric, salt, poha, and mix well.
Sauté onions and green chili until soft.
Add tomatoes and cook until pulpy.
Add crumbled paneer, turmeric, and salt; cook for 5 minutes.
Sauté onions and mushrooms in olive oil.
Add rice and toast for 2 minutes.
Gradually add stock, stirring continuously until rice is creamy.
Mix in parmesan and serve.
Mix vegetables with cornflour and salt to form small balls.
Fry balls until golden and crisp.
Toss in soy sauce and chili sauce; serve hot.
Sauté red curry paste in oil until fragrant.
Add coconut milk and bring to a simmer.
Add tofu and vegetables; cook until vegetables are tender.
Grind soaked rice and dal into a smooth batter; ferment overnight.
Prepare potato filling with onions and spices.
Spread batter on a hot griddle, cook until crisp, fill with potato masala.
Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Sauté garlic in olive oil, add chili flakes.
Toss spaghetti in garlic oil, garnish with parsley.
Sauté garlic in oil, add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-6 minutes.
Add soy sauce and peanuts, cook for 2 more minutes.
Serve hot.
Marinate paneer and bell peppers in yogurt and spices for 15 minutes.
Skewer and grill until golden brown.
Serve hot with chutney.
Cook fettuccine until al dente.
Prepare sauce by melting butter, adding garlic and cream.
Mix in parmesan and toss pasta with sauce.
Boil noodles until al dente, drain and set aside.
Stir-fry vegetables and garlic for 3-4 minutes.
Add noodles and soy sauce; toss well and serve hot.
Sauté green curry paste until fragrant.
Add coconut milk and bring to a simmer.
Add tofu and vegetables; cook until tender.
Mix boiled potatoes with tamarind chutney, green chili, and chaat masala.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve.
Cook gnocchi in boiling water until they float.
Sauté garlic in olive oil, add tomatoes and cook into a sauce.
Toss gnocchi in tomato sauce and garnish with basil.
Boil corn and carrots in vegetable broth until tender.
Mix cornflour with water and add to soup to thicken.
Season with soy sauce and serve hot.
Cook rice noodles as per instructions.
Mix peanut butter, soy sauce, and a little water to make sauce.
Toss noodles and vegetables in sauce and serve.
Grind rice and dal into a batter; ferment overnight.
Steam batter in idli molds for 10-12 minutes.
Grind coconut, chili, and ginger to make chutney; serve with idlis.
Cook penne until al dente.
Sauté garlic in olive oil, add tomatoes and chili flakes.
Mix pasta with sauce and serve.
Mix cabbage, carrot, and soy sauce.
Fill wrappers with vegetable mixture, roll tightly.
Deep fry until golden and crispy.
Boil broth with lemongrass and galangal for 10 minutes.
Add mushrooms and tofu; cook for 5-7 minutes.
Season with soy sauce and lime juice; serve hot.
Mix cauliflower with cornflour, spices, and ginger-garlic paste.
Deep fry until golden and crispy.
Toss in soy sauce and serve hot.
Boil ravioli until al dente.
Mix spinach with ricotta to make filling and bake ravioli if using fresh pasta.
Serve with heated tomato sauce on top.
Stir-fry vegetables in oil for 2-3 minutes.
Add rice and sauces; toss well until heated through.
Serve hot garnished with spring onions.
Sauté onions and spices until fragrant.
Add tomato puree and cook until oil separates.
Add paneer and cream; simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir-fry garlic in oil, add vegetables and cook 3-4 minutes.
Add soy sauce and basil; toss quickly and serve.
Sauté onions and mushrooms in olive oil.
Add rice and toast for 2 minutes.
Gradually add broth, stirring until creamy; finish with parmesan.
Form vegetable balls with cornflour and fry until golden.
Prepare gravy with soy sauce, ketchup, and green chili.
Add fried balls to gravy and simmer for 5 minutes; serve hot.
